rows.label: tev001894_MSG0001
rows.name: How's it going, Chief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0002
rows.name: This is your kitty cat, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0003
rows.name: Aw, man! Lucky! I wish I had a pet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0004
rows.name:
I've never had one. Not even when I was a kid.
But I guess there's nothing stopping me now, huh?
So what do you think I should get?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_JNK0010
rows.name: Say "Cat"

rows.label: tev001894_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Mia that a cat would suit her perfectly.

rows.label: tev001894_JNK0020
rows.name: Say "Dog"

rows.label: tev001894_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest Mia get a good and faithful dog.

rows.label: tev001894_JNK0030
rows.name: Say "Nopon"

rows.label: tev001894_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Mia that Nopon are all the rage now.

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0005
rows.name:
Huh? What do you mean, a cat would "suit me"?
Is it because I like playing with yarn? Because I do.
But really, who doesn't enjoy a nice ball of yarn?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0006
rows.name:
Or is it because of my name? You know. Mia? Meow?
All the mechanics used to think it was soooooo funny
to say "Well, Mia-YOOOOW!" whenever I got angry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0007
rows.name:
Yeah, no. I think a cat is too predictable.
Although I guess we'd have a lot in common...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0008
rows.name: A dog, huh? Yeah, dogs are cool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0009
rows.name:
I could throw a tennis ball for it on my day off...
It would lick my face when I got up in the morning...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0010
rows.name:
That might be the perfect partner for a lonely girl
living all by herself on a strange weirdo planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0011
rows.name: Nopon aren't pets, Chief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0012
rows.name:
Although I did give that "Tatsu" Nopon of yours a
can of tuna onceâ€”thing followed me around for the
rest of the day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0013
rows.name:
Still, you can't treat Nopon like pets.
They're people just like us! Er, for the most part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0014
rows.name:
Still, I hear that I can't get ANY pet without official
permission first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0015
rows.name:
You've done all sorts of great things, Chief, so you
probably didn't even need to apply for permission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0016
rows.name: But ol' Mia is starting from square one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0017
rows.name:
That means I have to complete 1,000 BLADE missions
AND own a house. And that just gets me an interview![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0018
rows.name:
Not to mention that this little kitten is a state-of-the-art,
precision piece of machinery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0019
rows.name:
These things cost more than a car, right?
I probably can't even afford one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0020
rows.name:
You know what? When I feel lonely, I'm just gonna
come bug you at your floor of the barracks and ask
to pet your cat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001894_MSG0021
rows.name: Be seeing you, Chief. Probably more than you'd like![ST:wait ]
